Batch update to change subject links.

did.abstract: The Tichenor mss., 1929, consist of letters from journalist Ernest "Ernie" Taylor Pyle, 1900-1945, to Elizabeth Fisher Tichenor, 1901-1990.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.
Many collections are housed offsite; retrieval requires advance notice. Please make an appointment a minimum of one week in advance of your visit.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Elizabeth Fisher Tichenor, 1901-1990, was born in Indiana and was a friend of journalist Ernest "Ernie" Taylor Pyle, 1900-1945.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Tichenor mss., 1929, consist of letters from journalist Ernest "Ernie" Taylor Pyle, 1900-1945, to Elizabeth Fisher Tichenor. The letters discuss mutual friends and recent events. Newspaper clippings, 1944-1985, and several miscellaneous items complete the collection.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Photography and digitization may be restricted for some collections. Copyright restrictions may apply. Before publishing, researchers are responsible for securing permission from all applicable rights holders, then filling out the Permission to Publish form.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Tichenor mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.
